Package com.fssa.needstobedone.dao

package com.fssa.needstobedone.dao
This package contains Data Access Object (DAO) classes that handle database interactions for various entities. DAO classes provide methods to perform CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) operations on the database

The DAO classes in this package interact with the database to manage data related to users and jobs. Each DAO class is responsible for specific database operations related to its respective entity.

  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    com.fssa.needstobedone
    This package is like the main control room of the needs to be done portal.
    com.fssa.needstobedone.exception
    This package contains user-defined exceptions that help the needs to be done portal to handle unexpected situations.
    com.fssa.needstobedone.model
    This package has classes that represent different modules in the needs to be done portal.
    com.fssa.needstobedone.services
    This package has classes that manage different parts of the needs to be done portal.
    com.fssa.needstobedone.utils
    This package includes useful helpers for various tasks in the app.
    com.fssa.needstobedone.validation
    This package contains classes responsible for validating data inputs and ensuring they meet specific criteria.
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    JobDAO
    The JobDAO class provides methods for interacting with the database to perform various operations related to jobs.
    UserDAO
    The UserDAO class provides methods for interacting with the database to perform various operations related to users.
